statements: SELECT * FROM Claims
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE approval_status = 'Pending'
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_date FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_type LIKE 'Car%'
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_type = 'Car Accident' AND approval_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY claim_id ASC
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_date, approval_status FROM Claims WHERE claim_type LIKE 'Health%' ORDER BY approval_status ASC, claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount, approval_status FROM Claims WHERE approval_status IN ('Approved', 'Denied') ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, amount FROM Claims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, approved_by FROM Approvals WHERE approval_id = 3;
SELECT requested_by, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Claims GROUP BY requested_by;
SELECT * FROM Claims JOIN Approvals ON Claims.claim_id = Approvals.claim_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY approval_date DESC
SELECT claim_type, amount, requested_by FROM Claims WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01' AND request_date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT claim_id, approval_date, approved_by FROM Approvals JOIN Claims ON Approvals.claim_id = Claims.claim_id WHERE approved_by = 'John Doe'
SELECT requested_by, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Claims GROUP BY requested_by HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM ReimbursementRequests;
SELECT request_id, claimant_name, total_amount, request_date FROM ReimbursementRequests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, claimant_name, total_amount FROM ReimbursementRequests WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT denial_id, denial_reason, denied_by FROM Denials WHERE denial_reason LIKE '%missing%' ORDER BY denial_id DESC;
SELECT request_id, approved_by, approval_date, approved_amount FROM Approvals WHERE approved_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM ReimbursementRequests WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, total_amount FROM ReimbursementRequests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Approvals JOIN ReimbursementRequests ON Approvals.request_id = ReimbursementRequests.request_id WHERE approved_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY approval_date ASC;
SELECT denial_reason FROM Denials WHERE denied_by = 'Manager A' ORDER BY denial_id DESC;

SELECT claimant_name, denial_reason FROM ReimbursementRequests JOIN Denials ON ReimbursementRequests.request_id = Denials.request_id WHERE denial_reason LIKE '%missing receipts%' ORDER BY claimant_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM Reimbursement WHERE reimbursement_amount > 1000;
SELECT approval_id, approver_name, approval_date FROM Approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT denial_id, denial_reason FROM Denials ORDER BY denial_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT r.Claim_id, r.reimbursement_date, a.approver_name FROM Reimbursement r INNER JOIN Approvals a ON r.reimbursement_id = a.reimbursement_id;
SELECT d.denial_reason, c.claim_amount FROM Denials d LEFT JOIN Claims c ON d.claim_id = c.claim_id WHERE d.denial_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Reimbursement WHERE approval_status = 'APPROVED' AND reimbursement_amount < 5000 ORDER BY reimbursement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reimbursement_requests;
SELECT id, claimant_id, amount FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description, submitted_date FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE claimant_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM claimants WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT id, name FROM approvers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reimbursement_requests ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT claimant_id, SUM(amount) FROM reimbursement_requests GROUP BY claimant_id
SELECT description, submitted_date FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT claimants.name, reimbursement_requests.amount FROM claimants INNER JOIN reimbursement_requests ON claimants.id = reimbursement_requests.claimant_id
SELECT approval_records.approver_id, approval_records.approval_date, approvers.role FROM approval_records INNER JOIN approvers ON approval_records.approver_id = approvers.id
